I am a software engineer who prides myself on finding the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular.

content.text: Hi, I'm a software engineer who loves working with data. I'm also a singer. What about you?
I'm a restaurant manager who loves traveling and writing in my journal. What's your favorite movie?
I like to watch movies too. I recently watched "The Greatest Showman" and loved the soundtrack.
I haven't seen that yet! But I love musicals. What's your favorite song from the soundtrack?
"The Greatest Show" is my favorite song from the soundtrack. It's so inspiring!
I'll have to check it out! I love songs that make me feel good.
I have a box of letters from my parents that I keep safe. It's my most prized possession.
That's so sweet. I keep my journal safe, too. It's my most valued material possession.
I love journaling. It's a great way to express myself and explore my thoughts and feelings.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'd love to be friends.
